header.publishDisabled: Publish project (only works from the Superpowers app for technical reasons)

newAsset.title: New asset (Ctrl+N)
newAsset.prompt: Select the type and enter a name for the new asset.

newFolder.title: New folder (Ctrl+Shift+N)
newFolder.prompt: Enter a name for the new folder.

rename.title: Rename (F2)
rename.prompt: Enter a new name for the asset.

duplicate.title: Duplicate (Ctrl+D)
duplicate.prompt: Enter a name for the new asset.

trash.title: Trash (Delete)
trash.prompt: Are you sure you want to trash the selected entries?
